trans-unit.source: Keep your driveway and sidewalks clear of snow and ice by shovelling after any snowfall.

seg-source.mrk: Keep your driveway and sidewalks clear of snow and ice by shovelling after any snowfall.

target.mrk: Keep your driveway and sidewalks clear of snow and ice by shovelling after any snowfall.

trans-unit.source: Get the shovel out of the garage

seg-source.mrk: Get the shovel out of the garage

target.mrk: Get the shovel out of the garage

trans-unit.source: Shovel the driveway, starting at the garage door and working out to the street.

seg-source.mrk: Shovel the driveway, starting at the garage door and working out to the street.

target.mrk: Shovel the driveway, starting at the garage door and working out to the street.

trans-unit.source: Shovel the sidewalk in front of your house.

seg-source.mrk: Shovel the sidewalk in front of your house.

target.mrk: Shovel the sidewalk in front of your house.

trans-unit.source: Shovel the walk to your front door.

seg-source.mrk: Shovel the walk to your front door.

target.mrk: Shovel the walk to your front door.
